summary: Utility module for parsing CellVoyager/Yokogawa well identifiers. It extracts row and column indices from well IDs, creates split strings for row/column separation, and retrieves well IDs from filenames, supporting the construction of a structured metadata DataFrame for imaging data.
business_intent: Provide a reliable way to translate raw file naming conventions into structured well position metadata, enabling downstream highâ€‘throughput screening analysis pipelines to correctly associate images with their experimental well locations.
